title: Training Day
author: Studio
description: Learn the machine. Feed the machine. Become the machine.

chapters.title: Basic Training
chapters.description: The foreman points at the machine. Time to learn.

pages.narrativeNote: Step 1: Machine powers up. Simple 2-letter success to teach basic input.
Step 2: Machine starts. Reinforces basic input with 5 letters.
Step 3: CRITICAL - Letters shown scrambled as OOSP. Player types O, O correctly. Types S (wrong position - expected P). S highlights on board. Player learns wrong-position mechanic, types P, then S.

chapters.title: The Lesson
chapters.description: Some things cannot be known without help.

pages.narrativeNote: Step 4: THE IMPOSSIBLE SENTENCE. Theme/Tag helpers not yet available. Player WILL fail. This teaches: (1) failure earns cube scrap, (2) The Pit exists, (3) helpers have value. If player somehow guesses it, award achievement 'Figured Out the Impossible' and give 1 scrap anyway.
Step 6: SAME SENTENCE but now Theme helper is unlocked. Player should complete it easily with 'Factory Orders' visible. Full economy loop taught: fail -> earn scrap -> buy helper -> succeed.
